headline: Goldman, Barclays Lower Roper (ROP) Price Targets Amid Muted End-Market Expectations
summary: Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is included among the 12 Best Long Term US Stocks to Buy Now. On December 16, Goldman Sachs cut its price target on Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) to $507 from $572 and kept a Neutral rating on the stock. A few days earlier, on December 4, Barclays also lowered its target […]
